divs: Sighting DetailsSaw what looked like a satalite crossing the sky. No flashing lites. dimly lit. Orange glow. Going across the sky at speed a little faster than passenger jets. Stright trojectory, then all of a sudden, the object stops and hovers. Makes some irratic movements. I had a flashlight and shined it at the object and attempted to mimic the same movements as I saw doing. To my amazement, the object imediately turned off its lights. They actually dimmed as they went out. This was not a case of autokenesis, as I did look at it through a telescope and witnessed it moving in the scope. I remained dim for several minutes. Then it slowly turned its lights on and after watching it for a few minutes and left in the same path it was taking.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in El Dorado
There were no other sightings in El Dorado on or around December 14th 2009
Summary: Sky clear. What I thought was a satalite stops and hovers 15 minutes
